description.x-y:
With a parting threat, the user lowers
the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:

the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

effect.full: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
